article.headline: Charting a 'bull trend' whipsaw, S&P 500 holds the range top
article.body: U.S. stocks are firmly higher early Wednesday, rising amid the latest market whipsaw fueled by the fiscal-stimulus saga. Against this backdrop, the S&P 500 has reclaimed major resistance (3,393), rising from a successful test of familiar support. Before detailing the U.S. markets' wider view, the S&P 500's  hourly chart highlights the...
